Must say this place is a 5 star. Little hidden gem. We found this place by accident because we were walking in the small ally like streets. Place was full and really clean and the food we had was amazing. We had the pork ribs, the goat cheese salad and crochets. We left very satisfied so much so, that 3 hours later we were hungry again and we made it a mission to find the place again. We've finally found it, sadly to find they closed. Til next time Spain
